question.title: Flower Shop
question.content:
Oasis visits a Florist Shop. Shop has N flowers each being of a specific type and every flower costs 1 unit.

You are given type of each flower in an array P = [p1,p2,...,pN]. If he buys a flower of type P’ , then he will get all flowers whose type lies between P’ to P’+4 (both inclusive) for free.

You need to find and print the price Oasis has to pay to buy all flowers.

Input Format
The first line contains an integer N i.e. number of flowers.
Next line will contain N integers, representing the types of N flowers.
Output Format
Print minimum cost with which Oasis could buy all of flowers.
Constraints
1 <= N <= 10^5
0 <= pi <= 10^4
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 17 10
Sample Output
3

rephrased.body: A florist shop has N flowers, each of a specific type, and each flower costs 1 unit. Oasis wants to buy all the flowers. If Oasis buys a flower of type P', he gets all flowers with types between P' and P'+4 (inclusive) for free. Determine the minimum cost for Oasis to buy all the flowers.

testcases.explanation: Oasis buys flower of type 1, getting flowers of type 1,2,3 for free. Then, buy flower of type 10, so flowers of type 10 is free. Then buy flower of type 17 so price will be 3 .
